column1: Authentication – Login API (Test Scenarios & Test Cases)
Login with valid username and password
→ Verify that the API returns 201 Created and generates a valid authentication token.
Login with empty or missing credentials (invalid payload)
→ Verify that the API returns 400 Bad Request with an appropriate validation error message.
Login with valid username and invalid password
→ Verify that the API returns 401 Unauthorized indicating authentication failure.
Login with invalid username and valid password
→ Verify that the API returns 401 Unauthorized indicating authentication failure.
